Message.Msg: ... “You know you live in a Country run by idiots if (blah, blah, blah,) – fake ricky You know you live in a great country run by duly elected representatives of the majority of the people when those people can laugh at the feeble attempts of the idiotic lunatic fringe of the losing side to spread canned spam messages of hate, intolerance and lies, originated by the Tea brains, and forwarded using dipsticks with copycat aliases on a stock message board. Speaking of “slothful, lazy behavior”…you consider posting here daily with multiple aliases to be “hard work and success?” How very strange. “You can write a post like this just by reading the news headlines.” Really? You wrote this all by yourself, did you? Then why is it posted all over extremist, xenophobic websites including the Ventura County Tea Party? How can anyone call our elected officials “idiots” when they’ve previously foisted upon us geniuses like “W”, Dan Quayle, and the biggest collection of obtuse non-thinkers like Bachman, Palin, Herman Cain, Rick Perry and Christine “I am not a witch” O’Donnell, ever assembled? In your heart, you know he’s WAY FAR right.

"and the biggest collection of obtuse non-thinkers like Bachman, Palin, Herman Cain, Rick Perry and Christine “I am not a witch” O’Donnell, ever assembled?" Well, I suppose it's fair to say we all have our versions of Nancy and Harry. The good news is ours aren't in significant positions of leadership.
... "The good news is ours aren't in significant positions of leadership." True that!

Message.Title: wall street greed bankrupts u.s.a.
Message.Msg: to save the nation: courts must be ordered to place a value on all u.s.a. manufacturing businesses. federal government must guarantee employee takeover loans, of all wall street owned companies. or! the greed of wall street will continue to move u.s.a. manufacturing overseas. and there will be a violent revolution to change government. will government act?? or? is congress intently bankrupting the u.s.a.? to create a police state? next few days will tell!!!!!!!

Although we have paid for our own stuff, we have allowed our government to waste an awful lot that our children, grandchildren, and great grandchildren will be stuck with. Way back when Roosevelt started paying farmers not to grow crops we should have been protesting. Of course I was only 7 and could only run around the school yard yelling "Landon, Landon, he's the man; he'll kick Roosevelt in the garbage can". And Roosevelt beat not only Landon but Wendel Wilkee also. Two great men that could have returned America to reasonable government. "Now we are engaged in a great civil war; testing whether our nation can long endure". Like Ron Paul, I fear we have gone beyond the point of no return and I expect my great grandchildren will live in a One World Government as slaves.

Every day Wall Street places a value on every company far more effectively than any court could do. The problem is that employees don't get involved in the ownership of the companies they work for. That makes them feel like pawns. Why not pay half of their wages in shares of stock so they become owners of the company. WINCO is doing that and they have some of the finest grocery stores in California.

Topic.Title: taxes must be raised to fund unfunded wars!

Message.Msg: In the last years we have provided direct cash aid to: Hamas - 351 M, Libya 1.45 B, Egypt - 397 M, Mexico - 622 M, Russia - 380 M, Haiti - 1.4 B, Jordan - 463 M, Kenya - 816 M, Sudan - 870 M, Nigeria - 456 M, Uganda - 451 M, Congo - 359 M, Ethiopia - 981 M, Pakistan - 2 B, South Africa - 566 M, Senegal - 698 M, Mozambique - 404 M, Zambia - 331 M, Kazakhstan - 304 M, Iraq - 1.08 B, Tanzania - 554 M, With literally Billions of Dollars and they still hate us!!!! Our retired seniors living on a 'fixed income receive no aid nor do they get any breaks while our government and religious organizations pour hundreds of Billions of $$$$$$'s and Tons of Food to foreign countries! We have hundreds of adoptable children who are shoved aside to make room for the adoption of foreign orphans. AMERICA: a country where we have homeless without shelter, children going to bed hungry, elderly going without needed medication and mentally ill without treatment -etc. YET....................... They have A 'Benefit' For the people of Haiti on 12 TV stations, Ships and planes lining up with food, water, tents clothes, bedding, doctors and medical supplies. Imagine if The *GOVERNMENT* Gave 'US' the same support they give to other countries. Sad isn't it?

I think the final score was Obama 53--Romney 47. Now who is the silly fool. Fool.

There is a lack of demand because there are still so many out of work. The unemployment numbers put out by the government may not be a lie, but they aren't as accurate as they should be if you really want to learn how many people that want to work are still out of work. The recovery is still failing. Forget what they market has done over the past week, there are too many other people manipulating the market for the government to have much influence on it. Even the media stories that are supposed to be the reasons for all the market fluctuations are bogus. The fiscal cliff bill raised taxes on everyone and increased our debt even more with all the pork that was included and Congress nor can the President deny that they knew this abomination included all this additional spending. You can talk of grand bargains all you want but the Democrats have flat refused to have any meaningful discussion about cost reductions as has the President. They have no intentions of reducing spending or reworking welfare, Medicare, Social Security at all and if they do even open discussions (which will result in zero action taken) it won't be until after the mid-term elections. Again, another prime example of their attitudes of protecting their jobs and their Party over the responsibility they have to the American taxpayers. Obama just changed the way people have to respond in order to get visas for trailing family members without even consulting Congress, he simply changed the way the government will follow or not follow the existing laws. The man is working toward a dictatorship and no that he has been reelected; he isn't even being subtle about it.

I had a dream last night... There sat the dog faced John Kerry before the Senate confirmation hearings for his appointment to Secretary of State. After the Chair had praised his vast "Diplomatic Experience"... Followed by praise for his integrity, honorable service, etc. He finally turns the hearing over to the rest of the panel for questioning... and here is where my dream turned to fantasy... For in my dream... the first Republican Senator to ask a question starts like this.... Senator... your life story is a long and storied one...well known throughout the world... and the Chair has praised your integrity and diplomatic experience... I'd like to start by asking you to once again to describe your famous Christmas Eve, secret mission into Cambodia... Which I find most interesting since you weren't even in SE Asia during the Christmas time of year? Then I would like to ask... is consorting with our nations enemies part of your "Diplomatic Experience"... Like North Vietnam while we were at war? The Sandinista's while we were engaged in conflict in Central America? The butcher Assad and Saddam Hussein in the Middle East... and the Russians and Chinese when we were engaged in the Cold War? And would you explain to us how you recruited your fellow "Winter Soldiers" to come and testify before Congress about atrocities committed by our American Soldiers and Marines... when most of the so called witnesses you recruited... were never even in the military or had ever gone to Vietnam? Remind us of your eye witness accounts of our Vietnam Veterans as being as ruthless as the hordes of Genghis Khan? Tell us when and where you observed that first hand, Senator Kerry? And then I'd like to know why your citations for your Silver Stars were signed by a Secretary of the Navy... many years and years after the war was over? And also, is it true as charged by eye witnesses... Your Purple Hearts were as a result of your own incompetence? Friendly fire by your own hand? These are just some of the questions I have... and should be answered before your confirmation. And in my dream... I was cheerleading the line of questioning and thinking subconsciously... "Ask why he couldn't pass the Bar Exam... if he is so brilliant"? "Ask him why he parked his boat in Rhode Island... Was it to avoid taxes on it in his home state"? "Ask him how he has accumulated such grand wealth on the salary of a Senator"? "Is it true that your wealth was derived by marrying homely, if not down right, ugly... rich heiresses and widows"? "And ask him why the men who served with him in Vietnam... universally hate his guts... along with 99.9% of all Vietnam Veterans"? "Ask him if it is true that of all the men and women in the U.S. Senate... he is known to be the most egotistical of them all... only his good buddy, John McCain comes close. A man who also married well... birds of a feather......"? And then... I woke up! Ain't gonna happen... Politicians are gutless! But I have to ask myself? Is this the face America wants to present to the rest of the world? A man who has made a career of lies, falsehoods and deceit? I can think of no human being... who symbolizes the term; "Ugly American" more than John Kerry. A liar, a phony, arrogant, piece of human dog squeeze if there ever was one! Is this a man we should be proud to be hailed as a "Great American"? Can any foreign leader ever trust a single word out of this man's mouth... when it is documented that he has lied to his own countrymen...time after timeafter time... Is this the best we have offer? In a perfect world... this man wouldn't even be considered for "Dog Catcher"... even though he did manage to capture two in his lifetime. He is an insult... a mortal insult... to all who have served !!!!! -- Ed Schriber Col. USMC (Ret.) "Semper Fi"

Message.Title: Having problems?
Message.Msg: Called ATT the other day to get my account straightened out. They signed me up to U-Vers and I said OK. Then I find out that I don't have U-Vers in my area and aren't sure when they willever have it. So I tried to cancel my U-Vers installation not once but 5 different times. They still have me signed up to U-Vers. This week ATT sends me the U-Vers equipment to hook up. I call ATT to tell them that I don't have U-Vers and what they want me to do with the U-Vers equipment that they sent me,but I can't get an oxygen breathing ATT employee on the telephone. My wife tells me to take the U-Vers package back to our local ATT office but I fear they won't except it. I've already slugged down about 6 margarites in frustration. Should I take the U-Vers gadget to the ATT office or should I continue guzzling down margarites? Whoopie!

Message.Msg: Gun Control Stats – Compare the ten big ‘killers’ in the U.S. per the FBI Tobacco use 529,000 Medical errors 195,000 Unintentional injuries 118.021 Alcohol abuse 107,400 Motor Vehicle 34,485 Accidental poisoning 25,500 Accidental falls 24,792 Non-firearm homicides 16,799 Firearm homicides 11,493 According to the FBI, the #1 weapon used in violent crimes…is a baseball bat. Sending Biden off on his little crusade is either a knee jerk reaction, a way to get rid of him for a few months or just another deflection to mask another move Obama intends to make.

Now if someone could get the idea across to Congress that collectively we all need to pay for our stuff, we might survive. Until that happens this country is just sliding farther down that slippery slope to doom. Congress runs this economy, basically this country. They make their own rules, they have no one to answer to for their stupid decisions expect an ignorant electorate that pays them way less attention than they warrant. If we could put together a commission, Washington like these anyway, that would review, revise where necessary, the rules under which Congress acts and forces them to abide by them or suffer the consequences, there might actually be some accountability in Washington. A commission of Constitutional scholars, parliamentary proceedings experts, business leaders, and some just plain old taxpayers, they actually come up with a good plan. Not only allowing the fox into the hen house, but also allowing them to tell the chickens what do to, when and what to eat and how much to get paid simply is no longer working. Congress is out of control.

Do what your wife tells you to do. That is what got me through 64 great years of marriage. Your not married to AT&T so, if the won't ACCEPT it, leave it on their counter and take a picture of it with enough background to show it is their office. Send an e-mail to AT&T with a complete explanation and attach the picture. Names of the people at their office will help.

If you’re going to claim this was a great idea and boon for American business, show us! You seem to have plenty of information around all sorts of bizarre government statistics, surely you have these stats? With sources for you data of course.

... “I had a dream last night... There sat the dog faced John Kerry…And ask him why the men who served with him in Vietnam...universally hate his guts... along with 99.9% of all Vietnam Veterans"? – posted by usganut and attributed to Ed Schriber Vietnam Veterans hate no one who served in country. However, we’re not real big on chickenhawk cowards who send disproportionate numbers of minorities, the poor, and other folks’ kids off to war. Earlier today I commented on the fake ricky’s post which was not his own creation, but simply a widely circulated right wing ranting about “idiots who run the country.” I found it on The Ventura County Tea Party’s website (among other wacky groups.) Now, comes forth usganut (gee, USGA and pinhighshot – is there a “links” theme developing among the multiple aliased goofballs – what happened to the Igolf nutjob?) posting another lunatic swift boat rant against John Kerry. The diatribe, according to usganut, was attributed to Ed Schriber, Colonel, USMC. And then, lo and behold, look here…Ed Schriber also has his own page on The Ventura Country Tea Party’s silly propaganda site. Hence, fake ricky, usganut, pinhighshot, and many other noms de plume are all the same, silly little loser who refuses to accept that the election is over. Get over it. You lost, bozo. Now, if you could have cast one vote for each alias you use here, it would have been somewhat closer….nah, just kidding. You got your collective clocks cleaned and all the crying in the world won’t change that. Perhaps next time… instead of running on a platform of intolerance and Birther nonsense, endorsing voter suppression and gerrymandering, having a war on women and minorities, being generally totally out of sync with the majority of Americans and now, empty of legitimacy and short on morality, once again resorting to “swiftboating” tactics… perhaps next time you might think about finding some better candidates. And you might grow up, as well. Or, you could keep doing this, your day job, despite your glaring ineptitude. Either way, your foursome is out of mulligans…and you’re holding us up, so we’re playing through. “Fore!” In your heart, you know he’s really only Carl Spackler.
t.bfine I think the final score was Obama 53, Romney 47. Now, who is the silly fool, fool?

... “Go to FCC.gov…” – jon the anti-government, free-enterprise advocate Excuse me, jon. You suddenly are suggesting going to a regulatory agency of the government to get some control over a denizen of the free market system? What’s gotten into you, man? What happened to your “Laissez-faire at all cost” attitude of privatizing all things from education to energy with no accountability or regulatory oversight? It would appear that your handicap is intellectually self-induced as you find yourself dormied in the game of life. You’ve apparently skulled another one there, Stymie. Oh, well, enjoy caddie day.

A few years ago I had phone service with Bell South (part of AT&T) and wanted to switch to Comcast bundled service. Bell South told me I was NOT authorized to cancel my account. Comcast said Bell South needed to contact them so they could start my service. This went back and forth about 4 times. The last idiot I spoke with at Bell South told me again that Comcast had to cancel my service. I said "listen #$%$...I pay the f'n bill and you're telling me I am not authorized to stop my own damn service?" Then I said I knew who to call as I slammed the phone down in his ear. I called my state's PSC (public service commission) and things got fixed real quick.
